modules.description: Provides functions to create, resolve, and wait on promises, along with timeout and cancellation mechanisms. Operates on the promise data type, enabling asynchronous I/O and cooperative multitasking. Used to handle HTTP requests with deadlines, manage background tasks, and coordinate non-blocking operations in networked applications.

Provides functions to handle retryable and fatal errors in Lwt computations, including streaming attempts, adding exponential backoff delays, and limiting retry counts. Works with Lwt streams of results that may contain retryable or fatal errors, and tracks attempt counts. Used to implement resilient operations like network requests or resource acquisition that may fail temporarily.
